name.title: name
name.description: The name of this zone namespace.

world_name.title: world_name
world_name.description: A regular expersion (regex) that matches one or more world names completely. Acts as the default for all zones in this file, including referenced files. If not set at all, it defaults to ".*". See regex101.com for help.

reference.title: reference
reference.description: Zone namespace files with "reference" set will not load unless referenced by a main file (without "reference" set), or by another "reference" file that is referenced.

hidden.title: hidden
hidden.description: Whether to hide by default on the dynmap.

property_groups.title: property_groups
property_groups.description: Named lists of properties, to be applied or canceled in order. May contain other property groups. Do not include the '#' in the property group name here, it is implied. Please use the zone property group editor instead!

.*.description: The header here should only have one '#' - if that's all set, please continue to use # for property group names inside this list of properties.

zones.title: zones
zones.description: A list of zones; if two zones overlap, the one higher up the list takes priority.
